Ghostscript's built-in standard driver for Canon's inkjet printers.

NOTE: Due to a bug GPL Ghostscript 8.63 crashes when using this driver with PDF input data. With PostScript the driver works just fine.

The bug is fixed in the Ghostscript Subversion repository, so it will disappear in Ghostscript 8.64 and later. For Ghostscript 8.63 (and older) there is a patch available.
This driver probably does not work, because the printer only supports 300/600/1200 dpi. We use this driver and it seems to work. Change dpi to 600, 1200 doesnt work. Anyway, it prints very slow!
